Condor: Condor appeared in brigde and said to Maximal leader "Condor report=
s, sir... What's the situation?" 

{Talos}
Bridge

    Talos looked back ov=
er his shoulder from the battered remains of the weapons and defense system=
s computer, his eyes passing over Sunhawk who still seemed to want to go to=
 the brig, to the two new bots standing on deck. Looking over Condor and Si=
ref. "Stand easy Siref, well as you can see we've crashed. I've got some bo=
ts..." Looking pointedly at Sunhawk, indicating he should get to work on he=
lping Hot Rod, "... working on repairs, others are going to go through the =
ship and see who's still functioning."

    As Sunhawk got to work after di=
scharging himself of weapons he answered, "That's why I want sensors up, Ma=
ximal command seemed to think a group of Predicons were headed back to anci=
ent Earth, I suspect that's where we've crashed but I can't be sure, never =
been to the place myself. Once we have external sensors working again we ca=
n find out if this is the right planet and if so where we've been forced to=
 land."

    Moving to a locker in the floor by one of the chairs he extrac=
ts a small repair kit and opens the computers panel shifting under the cons=
ole to get at the wiring. "Siref and Condor you two should check out the th=
ruster section of the ship, see if anything can be salvaged, if anyone need=
s assistance to the CR chambers on deck two get them there first, by all re=
ports the thrusters are just so much slag..." Turning back to his work Talo=
s begins rejoining the connections under the computer panel using a small h=
and torch to fuse the bypassed lines together to make the connection stable=
 before trying the computer once more.
